pelit.takecareofhorsedesc: Take care of horse is a game where you care for a horse. Its voice soothes, and nourishes you, giving you an intent to care for it.

tietoa.tietoa: Hey, welcome to my site! I'll put here blogs, which contain, what I've been up to. Music if I want to show it, and games that I have developed! Hope you have a good time visiting my site! You can change language and site's theme by the upper-right corner!
